name: Grangers Performance Repellent Plus Spray 275ml
description:
Revive your once-waterproof garments. Regular maintenance helps waterproof-breathable fabrics work their best. When water stops beading up and starts soaking in, this spray-on waterproofer restores the DWR finish in your gear.Helps maximize both water repellency and breathability.PFC-free formula.Suitable for use on all GORE-TEX®, eVent and other wateproof-breathable fabrics.For best results, spray directly onto a freshly washed, damp garment from about 15cm away. Remove any excess drips with a clean cloth. Hang to dry naturally or follow drying instructions on the garment's care label.

        Sustainability
